revision.text: {{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=D7800 |revision=(Nighthawk X4S) |series=AC2600 |upc=606449109443 |asin=B01560JKAE;GB; |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |availability=now |est_release_date=09/02/2015 |fcc_date=05/29/2015 |fcc_id=PY315100302 |pcb_id=29764958 |type=wireless router,dsl modem |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8064 |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34MS01G2 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC64M16FP-DI |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, eSATA, |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9980 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9980 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=xDSL AFE (VRX320);Lantiq;PSB 80320;;1; |flags=ADSL2+, VDSL2, MU-MIMO |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=NETGEARXX |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=08:36:C9 |oui_eth=08:36:C9 }} {{TagLine|AC2600 Nighthawk X4S VDSL/ADSL Modem Router}} :[http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/dsl-modems-routers/D7800.aspx Product page] :[http://www.myopenrouter.com Open Source support] *[[Netgear D7800]] - [http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/dsl-modems-routers/D7800.aspx Nighthawk X4S AC2600 VDSL/ADSL Modem Router] :CPU: IPQ8064 @1.4GHz Dual Core SoC + [[Lantiq]] VR10 (ADSL2+/VDSL2) :QCA8337(Switch) + VRX320(VDSL) + QCA9980(5GHz) + QCA9980(2.4GHz) :512MB RAM/128MB ROM, 2x USB 3.0, 1x eSATA, 4x+1x GbE, 4x int./ext. ant. *OEM: [[Delta Networks]] - Board ID: 2976495801 :Hardware ID: 29764958+0+128+512+4x4+4x4 :• [[Netgear R7800]]/[[Netgear R7500v2|R7500v2]] - HW ID:2976495801 {{See also|Netgear XR450|Netgear XR500}} ===Product features=== *Quad-Stream AC2600 Wi-Fi for speeds up to 2.53Gbps (1733+800 Mbps) *Next generation Wave2 Wi-Fi (MU-MIMO, 256 QAM support) *Dual Core 1.4GHz processor boosts performance for gaming and streaming *Gigabit Ethernet WAN port for universal Internet service compatibility *Built in high speed modem compatible with VDSL2, ADSL2, ADSL2+ *Twin USB 3.0 and eSATA ports for external storage *Dynamic QoS bandwidth prioritization by application and device ===Specifications=== *Dual Core @1.4GHz processor boosts performance *Wi-Fi Performance: AC2600 (800Mbps + 1733Mbps) *Simultaneous Dual Band 2.4 GHz & 5 GHz *One (1x GbE) WAN port provides universal compatibility *Five (5x GbE) 10/100/1000 Ports with auto-sensing technology *DSL Modem Compatible with VDSL, VDSL2, ADSL, ADSL2, ADSL2+ *One (1x RJ11) DSL port, supports ADSL2/ADSL2+ and VDSL/VDSL2 *Two (2x) USB 3.0 ports, One (1x) eSATA port *Dimension: [[Dimensions::285 mm x 185 mm x 50 mm]] (WxHxD) *Weight: [[Weight::840 g]] ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.hwupgrade.it/forum/archive/index.php/t-2631463.html ''Netgear D7800'' on '''HWupgrade''' forums] ===See also=== :;[[Netgear D series]] • [[Netgear]] *[[Netgear D7000]] - [http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/dsl-modems-routers/D7000.aspx Nighthawk AC1900 WiFi ADSL/VDSL Modem Router] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM63138 @1GHz (ARM Dual Core) xDSL/Router SoC *[[Netgear D6400]] - [http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/dsl-modems-routers/D6400.aspx AC1600 WiFi VDSL/ADSL Modem Router] • [http://www.hwupgrade.it/forum/showthread.php?t=2716536 HWU] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM63168 @400MHz (MIPS Dual Core) xDSL/Router WiSoC *[[Netgear D6300]]v2 - [http://www.netgear.co.uk/home/products/networking/dsl-modems-routers/D6300.aspx AC1600 WiFi DSL Modem Router] :[[Lantiq]] AR10 (ADSL2+) + [[Lantiq]] VRX318 (VDSL2) *[[Netgear D6200v2]] - [http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/dsl-modems-routers/D6200.aspx AC1200 WiFi DSL Modem Router] :[[Lantiq]] AR10 (ADSL2+) *[[Netgear D6100]] - [http://www.netgear.co.uk/home/products/networking/dsl-modems-routers/D6100.aspx AC1200 WLAN Modem Router] :[[Lantiq]] AR10 ARX368 (ADSL2+), 128/128MB ROM/RAM :1x WAN, 2x LAN GbE, N300+AC867, antenna int. (2+2) *[[Netgear D6000]] - [http://www.netgear.co.uk/home/products/networking/dsl-modems-routers/D6000.aspx AC750 WiFi DSL Modem Router] :CPU: [[Ralink]]/Mediatek RT63368F + RT63087N (AFE) (ADSL2+) *[[Netgear D3600]] - [http://www.netgear.co.uk/home/products/networking/dsl-modems-routers/D3600.aspx N600 WiFi DSL Modem Router] :CPU: [[Ralink]]/Mediatek RT63368F + RT63087N (AFE) (ADSL2+) *[[Netgear D2200D]] - [http://www.netgear.com/service-providers/products/telco/gateways/d2200d.aspx ADSL Gateway] • FCC ID: PY314400297 *[[Netgear VEVG3000]] • [[Lantiq]] VRX318 + GRX (VDSL2 Bonding) *[[Netgear MVBR1000v4]] (LTE/Mobile) __NOTOC__
